snippet: “Taking My Time,” a Joel Meyerowitz retrospective book, puts bodies of his work in one place for the first time and is likely to go a long way toward redefining the career of the groundbreaking artist.
abstract: Fifty years of work by groundbreaking photographer Joel Meyerowitz is represented in a two-volume retrospective book Taking My Time and a related two-part exhibition at the Howard Greenberg Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “Taking My Time,” a Joel Meyerowitz retrospective book, puts bodies of his work in one place for the first time and is likely to go a long way toward redefining the career of the groundbreaking artist.

headline.seo: Joel Meyerowitz in New Book and at Howard Greenberg Gallery
headline.main: A Restless Lifetime of Paying Attention
